ygData.subject: Dragon Slaying
ygData.msgSnippet: What level do you people think should start going on dragon raids? The main levels that are best, I ve heard, are levels 35 - 50, but I d like your input as a
ygData.messageBody:
What level do you people think should start going
on dragon raids? The main levels that are best,
I've heard, are levels 35 - 50, but I'd like your
input as a lot of people have been telling me to
wait until levels 46 - 50 before I even go on my
first one. Any input would be well appreciated.
Thank you.

=====
Kinrea Keres 40th Teir'dal Warrior
Sinarya L'achesis 25th Teir'dal Necromancer
Lereny 8th Half elf Bard
Zyrrah 7th Teir'dal Cleric
<Amnesty>
Saryrn Server
